channel.title: Self-Doubt on Bongio's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Doubt on Bongio's blog

item.title: Cognitive biases, being yourself and fear of biases
item.description: A couple of minutes ago, I was thinking about the changes in approach to Mindiply. These days, I’m also listening to the Decisive audiobook by the Heath brothers about cognitive biases and decision-making.
